profile.bio: Don't mind me, just building stuff 🦝
posts:
This week I built a cool gashapon frame: https://edpon-frames.vercel.app/api

A new minting experience for both users and creators. For users, a new and fun way to discover and collect NFTs. For creators and artists, an easy way to leverage their creations and earn with each mint.

It really was a pleasure to build on this hackathon, had so much fun over the past few days building a farcaster frame 🥰

Now I'm really looking forward to build even more and to participate in more hackathons as well (looking at u /farhack 👀 )
Found this awesome NFT from EDPON Gachapon! Check it out!

post: Shares links and updates about projects
